p: Among the 57 “hits” subjected to the second screening, 50 were identified as cytotoxic hits, while five failed to inhibit either RdRp activity or IAV infectivity or both. Nevertheless, two compounds, JL-5001 and JL-5002, were identified to possess putative activity against influenza A virus infection by targeting RdRp ( Figure 4f, Table S1). Thus, the screen generates a hit rate of approximately 0.22%.
